title: Interview: Leonard Nimoy
teaser: Leonard Nimoy, best known for his role as Mr. Spock on Star Trek has died at the age of 83.  In 2009, WBHM's Michael Krall interviewed Nimoy who came to Birmingham to give a lecture about his photography.  While there were plenty of questions regarding his photography, Nimoy also took time to talk about his role as Mr. Spock.
